description: [Lazarus Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0032) has maintained persistence by loading malicious code into a startup folder or by adding a Registry Run key.(Citation: Novetta Blockbuster)(Citation: Novetta Blockbuster RATs)(Citation: McAfee Lazarus Resurfaces Feb 2018)(Citation: McAfee Lazarus Jul 2020)(Citation: Lazarus APT January 2022)
